# Launch checklist

Use before a proper launch (app store, marketing push, or public beta) for an Islamic tech product.

---

## Product

- [ ] Core flow works on target device (mobile / web)
- [ ] No critical bugs in main path
- [ ] Privacy policy and terms (or clear “coming soon”) linked
- [ ] Contact or support channel (email, form, or link)

---

## Islamic alignment

- [ ] [Islamic authenticity](islamic-authenticity.md) checklist done (if worship/finance/content)
- [ ] Calculation methods or sources stated where relevant (e.g. prayer times, zakat)
- [ ] No claims that require scholar approval without having it

---

## Messaging and presence

- [ ] One clear tagline or value prop
- [ ] App store / landing copy: title, short description, keywords (see [messaging for personas](messaging-for-personas.md))
- [ ] Social handle or page ready (if you’re launching there)

---

## Launch moment

- [ ] [Go-to-market](go-to-market.md) plan: where you’ll post and when
- [ ] One community or channel chosen for day-one feedback (e.g. Muslim devs, local mosque)
- [ ] If applicable: idea updated on [ideas.ummah.build](https://ideas.ummah.build) with live URL and status

---

## After launch

- [ ] Monitor for crash reports or error logs
- [ ] Check DMs or comments for feedback and respond within 24–48h
- [ ] Note top 3 improvements for the next iteration

---

*Part of the [workflows](https://github.com/ummahbuild/ideas/tree/main/docs/workflows) for taking ideas to production.*
